title: My first penta of the year was with Yasuo
body: how do i delete my account and restore honor to my family

replies.body:
You must commit sudoku

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/711/753/094.jpg
I think you're mixing up sudoku (explodey) with Seppuku (suicide)
That's the joke bud. Lol
I feel stupid lol. :DDDDDDDDDDDDDD
It's cool. We all have our moments. XD
O my god are you guys trying to kill im already dying from something before seeing this.

I've been playing since early ish 2015 and i have 4 pentas in SR :P
I got so many Quadra kills with Vel'Koz this year. never quite got the penta. feelsbadman. But I guess Jihn would be proud of me.

find the avatar

I'm sorry, but it appears you will forever stay…

git gud

>how do i delete my account and restore honor to my family

Contact Riot support, ask them to remove Yasuo from account.
> Contact Riot support, ask them to remove Yasuo from ~~account~~ the game.
Riot thinks me and Yasuo will get along just fine in the midlane next year ;_;
Mine says Kayle, Malphite, and Fiddlesticks. My least favorite champion is Kayle, I dont play many tanks unless they are op, and I hate AP junglers. Rito messed up for me.

>Not going Middlesticks, Crittlesticks, or Supportlesticks


I'm sad now
{{champion:157}} "My honor left a long time ago."
It doesn't tell me my first penta, it just says I have 14 of them.
All on Katarina or is there Master Yi in the mix?
Maybe they're playing illoai in low elo
Twitch, Yas, Vayne, and I don't know who else.

Those aren't easy pentakill champs, Kat, Master Yi, and Illoai are the infamous pentakill champs because they have special tools designed to go from person to person in teamfights killing them using powerful resets on one shot abilites. Twitch, Vayne, and Yasuo are just infamous in general and not for their pentakill tendencies, which are average. Yas and Vayne are even much better 1 v 1 or 1 v 2 than in pentakill scenarios
I mean those are the actual champions I got pentas with.
then it should be telling you which one you got your first on, that's weird af
It didn't :( r.i.p
The fact that you feel shame and regret means you have taken the first step on the path to redemption. We can't help you. This is your mountain to climb, my friend. {{champion:44}}
what has been done cannot be undone.

You think Yasuo is bad?

Bruh, my first penta this year was with Teemo.
Wait, were you the guy on the Facebook group League People bragging about this? >:^(

Only then may you return.
You think you feel bad? my fist penta was with **JHIN.** (the site says Quinn but that was a bot match)
Why is that bad? Jhin is aight.  He ain't cancer he's just popular.
I mean because it was 5 kills, not 4.
Jhin wouldn't know he scored a penta anyway. He can't count to 5.
